items.sentence: On hot days, sweat helps regulate the temperature of the body.
I find rain and wind more relaxing than the chirping of birds.
Most car accidents occur due to the inattention of the driver.
Language is the means by which people communicate with others.
Tom is going to get angry if you keep doing what you're doing.
Every time he comes up to Tokyo, he never fails to call me up.
It's been decided that we'll have a meeting a week from today.
I was surprised that Tom wasn't afraid to go there by himself.
I can't come in to the office today because I don't feel well.
Tom is the only man Mary ever talks to, other than her father.
He wanted to see his boss in Tokyo before leaving for America.
You're responsible for everything that's happened, aren't you?
Tom thought that it was rude to talk to Mary the way John did.
Tom figured out the cost and it was more than he could afford.
Tom is very busy today, but he'll try to fit you in somewhere.
Tom's gross income last year was over thirty thousand dollars.
Tom has written a very good paper on the production of rubber.
Tom had to overcome many obstacles before he achieved success.
I'm not sure what's wrong. We should've heard from Tom by now.
I'm pretty sure Tom didn't do what he said he was going to do.
